remarks: The projection map is a partial function from subspaces of the pre-Hilbert space to total operators.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
pjpm.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
pjpm.l $e |- L = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
pjpm.k $e |- K = ( proj ` W ) $.
pjpm $p |- K e. ( ( V ^m V ) ^pm L ) $.
